title: 求1.8.1守护者mod
author: ma2167311
txt_content: 如题，求1.8.1守护者mod，要附带安装说明，我下了个1.8.1守护者mod，安上后进不了游戏，只好在此发帖以求方法了

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
CastleDefense2.0.2.zip



CastleDefense2.0.2.zip
(126.48 KB, 下载次数: 26)



2011-10-29 04:34 上传
点击文件名下载附件







How to install:
1. It is always good to backup minecraft before instaling a new mod.
2. Install the latest modloader.
3. Delete META-INF from the minecraft.jar
5. Move the files from the "CastleDefese.rar" to bin/mincraft.jar. Use Winrar to open minecraft.jar.
6. Play

先安裝合適版本的 modloader
刪除 minecraft.jar 裡的 META-INF 文件夾
用Winrar之類的壓縮軟件開啟 minecraft.jar , 並把MOD壓縮檔內的所有文件全丟進 minecraft.jar 裡

應該不會有問題啊... 
也可能你裝了別的MOD, 發生衝突...
